item.title: You Are (Probably) Doing Login Systems Wrong
item.description: A thing, most programmers have tried at least once, is login systems. Despite being seemingly a simple task, it is in fact very hard to do right. So, let's look into, how we can actually do this right. Storing passwords Okay, this is common knowledge: Salt and hash your passwords. However, it is often done wrong. You'll see code like: hash(password + salt) This is better than unsalted, unhashed passwords, but it's far from bruteforce resistant.
